import java.util.*;
import java.io.*;

class threeel
{
	public static void main(String args[])throws IOException
	{
		try
		{
			InputStreamReader is = new InputStreamReader(System.in);
			BufferedReader bf = new BufferedReader(is);
			
			int t = Integer.parseInt(bf.readLine());
			for(int p=1; p<=t; p++)
			{
				int i, j, k;
				int n = Integer.parseInt(bf.readLine());
				String tokens[] = new String[n];
				tokens = bf.readLine().split(" ");
				int arr[] = new int[n];
				
				for(int l=0; l<n; l++)
				{
					arr[l] = Integer.parseInt(tokens[l]);
				}
				/*for(int l=0; l<n; l++)
				{
					System.out.println(arr[l]);
				}*/
				
				int max1=0, max2=0, max3=0, temp=0;
				
				for(i=0; i<n; i++)
				{
					if(arr[i]>max1)
					{
						max1 = arr[i];
						temp = i;
					}
				}
				arr[temp] = 0;
				//System.out.println(max1);
				for(j=0; j<n; j++)
				{
					if(arr[j]>max2)
					{
						max2 = arr[j];
						temp = j;
					}
				}
				arr[temp] = 0;
				
				for(k=0; k<n; k++)
				{
					if(arr[k]>max3)
					{
						max3 = arr[k];
						temp = k;
					}
				}
				arr[temp] = 0;
				
				int sum = max1 + max2 + max3;
				
				System.out.println("Case "+p+": "+sum);
			}
		}catch(Exception e)
		{
			return;
		}
	}
}
